title: Paniye Pani poove Lyrics Rajapattai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Javed Ali, Renu
Song: Panniye Panipoove
Music: Yuvan
Move: Rajapattai
Lyrics: Yugabharathi,

Paniye pani poovae, manam yeno parakudhe
Thalai kaal puriyaamal, unnai paarthu saami aadudhe
Uyire uyirt theeve, anal pole kodhikudhe
Veliye theriyaamal, unnai paarthu moochu vaangudhe..

Vedhaalam pole, nee velai seiyaadhe
Engengo thaavi, ennule aeraadhe

Kannu adikudhe, nenju nedikudhe
Raththam kothikudhe peipol kaadhal
Kathi tholikudhe, kannam sivakudhe
Sundi ezhukudhe noipoal kaadhal
Oh.. ..ho..... ..................(Paniye pani poovae...)

Kannae nee kaanum munnaal, Karam kallaaga vaazhdhene
Unpaarvai ennai theenda, idai kallaaga aanaene

Anbae nee pesum munnaal, Sema makkaana aal naanae
Un pechai Kaetap pinnaal, Pudhu book-aagip ponaene

Ènnai theriyaamal irundhene munbu naan
Èllam thelivaana oru yogi indru naan..
Unnai ninaiththaalae cell engum vinmeenthaan

Kannu adikudhe, nenju nedikudhe
Raththam kothikudhe peipol kaadhal
Kathi tholikudhe, kannam sivakudhe
Sundi ezhukudhe noipoal kaadhal
Oh.. ..ho..... ..................(Paniye pani poovae...)

Mulvelikulle vaadum, tamil-nilam pol aanaene
Anbe un Anbil naane, thani naadaagi povenae

Boomiku eerkum sakthi, athai yaar yaaro aaraaindhaargal
Anbae un eerpai sonnaen, palar appodhe saaidhaargal

Kangal yedharkaaga arivomae kaaranam
Kaigal yedharkaaga arivomae kaaranam
Ullam kalandhaalae adharku illai Kaaranam..
